resources.string: Reclaim your voice in our democracy!

"The goal of the bill is to formalize the federal government's role in regulating the " "safety of highly automated vehicles ( H.A.V.s, think self-driving cars). 

"
"Sponsor(s): Robert Lotta (R, Ohio, 5th District) 


" "Key Features 

" " • Emphasizes that states cannot enforce regulations or safety standards on H.A.V.s " "that conflict with federal government's regulations 

" " • Affirms a state's right to regulate the sale / distribution of H.A.V 

" " • Reiterates that drivers of H.A.V.s assume liability in the same way as if they were " "driving a regular motor vehicle 

" " • Imposes more rigorous safety reporting standards for H.A.V. manufacturers including " "a focus on cybersecurity to prevent systems from being hacked 

" " • Authorizes the creation of a Highly Automated Vehicle Advisory Council responsible " "for gathering information, developing technological advice, and presenting recommendations 

" " • Requires manufacturers to specify privacy policies regarding data collected from H.A.V.s 

"
Do you approve or disapprove this bill?
Do You Approve or Disapprove of the Way Bobby Rush Has Done His Job?

"Elected Office: 
" " • US House of Representatives, 1993-Present 
" " • US Army, 1963-1968 

" "Education: 
 " • Master's, Political Science, University of Illinois at Chicago 
" " • Master's, Divinity, McCormick Theological Seminary 
" " • Bachelor's, Political Science, Roosevelt University 

" "Personal: 
" " • Married to wife, Carolyn; 7 children 
" " • Attends Beloved Community Church of God in Christ, Chicago, IL"
Register of Copyrights Selection & Accountability Act

"Political Science student at the University of Chicago. While in college founded a" " non-profit consulting firm that aided non-profits on the South-side of Chicago and in" " Guatemala. John also has experience working in the Obama White House and the United States" " State Department."

"Political Science student at the University of Chicago. Created a product-based start-up" " while in High School that was featured in the Kaufman Foundation's Summer Catalog. Also" " has marketing and venture capital experience"
